hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT DISTINCT cvt.SppCode FROM ClassValueTable AS cvt WHERE cvt.ClassifierId = 4 AND cvt.YearGuid = :y
UPDATE ClassValueTable SET ClassValueName = :cn, ClassValueName1 = :sn WHERE ClassifierId = 4 AND YearGuid = :y AND SppCode = :sp

UPDATE IndividualTreeEffects AS ite SET SppScientificName = r.ClassValueName1, SppCommonName = r.ClassValueName FROM ( SELECT cvt.YearGuid, p.PlotId, t.TreeId, cvt.ClassValueName, cvt.ClassValueName1 FROM ClassValueTable AS cvt INNER JOIN EcoTrees AS t ON t.Species = cvt.SppCode INNER JOIN EcoPlots AS p ON t.PlotKey = p.PlotKey WHERE cvt.ClassifierId = 4 ) AS r WHERE r.YearGuid = ite.YearGuid AND r.PlotId = ite.PlotId AND r.TreeId = ite.TreeId AND ite.YearGuid = :y

UPDATE IndividualTreePollutionEffects AS itpe SET SppScientificName = r.ClassValueName1, SppCommonName = r.ClassValueName FROM ( SELECT cvt.YearGuid, p.PlotId, t.TreeId, cvt.ClassValueName, cvt.ClassValueName1 FROM ClassValueTable AS cvt INNER JOIN EcoTrees AS t ON t.Species = cvt.SppCode INNER JOIN EcoPlots AS p ON t.PlotKey = p.PlotKey WHERE cvt.ClassifierId = 4 ) r WHERE r.YearGuid = itpe.YearGuid AND r.PlotId = itpe.PlotId AND r.TreeId = itpe.TreeId AND itpe.YearGuid = :y
